note: No, no. This is not an unfinished project. This is an actual portfolio for me. To view this on more humanize way, visit this link: https://www.figma.com/proto/2mw69JE10e0ANOslVWwV8w/Portfolio-Rommy-Gustiawan-Backend-Engineer-c.-2021
about: The name is Rommy, Rommy Gustiawan. Information System fresh graduate from Gunadarma University.
Deeply in love with anything related to tech and open source software movement.
Specialty in designing, developing, and deploying production ready RESTful API & native Android applications.
Passionate about TDD & building good coverage applications.

projects.name: Wikalpa
projects.description: Wikalpa is a RESTful API that provides a community-driven discussion platform for Indonesian citizens. Aim to be an all-in-one social media platform for discussing various topics.

projects.name: Loka's IM
projects.description: Loka‚Äôs IM (Inventory Management) is a RESTful API for helping Loka‚Äôs internal team transitioning their system from paper based into electronic-paperless-system.

projects.name: Geegeety
projects.description: Geegeety (Generasi GIGIH Tweety) is a Twitter-like social media for #GenerasiGIGIH students. Aim to help sharing information among students with ease.

projects.name: Kelasan
projects.description: Kelasan is a RESTful API for managing class homeworks and notes. Aim to help Indonesian students manage their school things during the online school phase.

projects.name: Popularin
projects.description: Popularin is an Android-based social media application for Indonesian film lovers. Aim to spread awareness of Indonesian films through a fun way.
